title: A Quarter million teenagers
creator_credit: Los Angeles City School, County Health Department and Robert Churchill
brief_description: Present physiological aspects of venereal disease. Discusses gonorrhea and syphilis indetail, explaining how the organisms enter the body, how the diseases affect tissues and organs, and how they may be recognised. Eplains that the diseases can be cured emphasizing the need for early treatment.
